name: Coots The Breaking Game
description:
Even if you aren't on screen, you can always jump and move back onto the screen :) Didn't have time for dynamic camera :( 

Game about breaking everything in Ludwig's room as fast as possible!

Joined late and had only a couple days to make it as the game jam date coincided with our 2 year anniversary and update for Alien Life Simulator. (third person sci fi roguelite)

Follow on twitter for updates on Alien Life Simulator and other games:

https://twitter.com/TheJustinSix

Entry to Ludwig Game Jam 2023.
